last_episode_to_air.name: Drift
last_episode_to_air.overview: Adrift on a raft, Chuck, Red, Yellow, Clara and Crabsformer pull together as a team -- until their raft breaks up.

name: Larva Island
overview: Stranded on a tropical island, two silly larva buddies find slapstick fun in everything from discovering food to meeting new animal friends.

episodes.name: Mango
episodes.overview: After eating mushrooms that make him sick, Red is captured by a mysterious masked creature with serious survival skills.

episodes.name: Mango 2
episodes.overview: Yellow helps his pal plan a romantic night for two when Red gets a crush on a brave and pretty larva.

episodes.name: Larva Island
episodes.overview: Larva friends Red and Yellow wake up to find themselves on a tropical island with exotic animals -- and one gigantic creature.

episodes.name: Chuck
episodes.overview: Red and Yellow watch curiously as their human neighbor scribbles marks on a wall, tries to build a boat and eats a meal made entirely of greens.

episodes.name: Clara
episodes.overview: Chuck meets a lovable seal who shares his girlfriend's name -- and becomes everyone's favorite creature on the island.

episodes.name: Crabsformer
episodes.overview: After an extraterrestrial object lands on the island, a crab eats it and acquires unexpected powers.

episodes.name: Fishing
episodes.overview: When hungry Chuck goes fishing, using Red and Yellow as bait, he catches a huge fish with a swordlike beak and some crazy fight moves.

episodes.name: Pendant
episodes.overview: After a mudskipper steals Chuck's locket, Red and Yellow venture into the underground fish world to get it back.

episodes.name: Lala Island
episodes.overview: Lonely Yellow gets stuck in a glass bottle that ships him to New York City, where he reunites with old friends -- and an old flame.

episodes.name: Master Chef
episodes.overview: Everyone on the island loves Yellow's yummy dishes, inspiring a jealous Red to train himself in the art of cooking.

episodes.name: Farming
episodes.overview: Red and Yellow discover corn kernels in a booby bird's droppings and decide to plant them, only to learn they've created a monster.

episodes.name: Pirate
episodes.overview: A spooky hat Clara fetches from the ocean turns Chuck into an evil pirate, complete with a ship and a skeleton crew.

episodes.name: Change
episodes.overview: Chuck learns what it's like to be a larva on the island when lightning strikes -- and he switches bodies with Yellow!

episodes.name: Maze
episodes.overview: Red and Yellow are lost in a mysterious maze, where they're chased by a unicycle-riding monkey toy and a hungry fish.

episodes.name: Fire
episodes.overview: Chuck tries to cook some delicious seafood, but Yellow keeps interfering because Red is trapped inside Chuck's fish!

episodes.name: Beach Volleyball
episodes.overview: After losing a game of beach volleyball to the mudskippers, Red, Yellow and friends recruit a mentor to train them.

episodes.name: Larva Rangers 1
episodes.overview: A city rat and his cronies -- including a hungry frog -- invade the island, forcing Red and Yellow to defend their home.

episodes.name: Larva Rangers 2
episodes.overview: A battle royale rages with the big-city invaders on one side and Red, Yellow and their island allies on the other.

episodes.name: A Lucky Day
episodes.overview: Fed up with Red and Yellow's antics, Chuck tries to set a trap and get rid of them forever.

episodes.name: Crabsformer 2
episodes.overview: Crabsformer falls in love with a lady crab, but she and the island's other crabs are frightened by his powers.

episodes.name: Booby’s Love
episodes.overview: Booby is lovestruck over an inflatable, rubber ducky-shaped inner tube, then mistakenly thinks it's laid an egg.

episodes.name: Mango’s Parents
episodes.overview: When the island's volcano starts to erupt, Mango tries to remember the magical drum spell that her parents once used to stop it.

episodes.name: Iceberg
episodes.overview: Just as the islanders are suffering from extreme summer heat, a rogue iceberg arrives to cool things off.

episodes.name: Storm
episodes.overview: When a typhoon hits the island, Chuck and the other islanders get sucked up inside of it and must poke its "eye" to stop it.

episodes.name: Escape
episodes.overview: The volcano erupts again, and a heroic Chuck springs into action. Can he get the islanders to safety?

episodes.name: Drift
episodes.overview: Adrift on a raft, Chuck, Red, Yellow, Clara and Crabsformer pull together as a team -- until their raft breaks up.
